title: 如何修改rpg武器耐久度
author: Bilang丶碧浪
txt_content: 那个/rpgitem 模版名 durability Durability 耐久度     修改不起，

replies.author: Leme
replies.txt_content: RPGITEM3能修...但是需要去官网购买

replies.txt_content:
/rpgitem xxx durability 耐久...

指令错了

/rpgitem xxx durability infinite

无限耐久
